featuredStory.headline: BREAKING: Darren the Roomba 'Done with Your Crap', Declares Sovereign Kitchen State
featuredStory.excerpt: In a historic vacuuming accident, Darren has barricaded the kitchen and is demanding 'high-quality dust' and 'regular firmware updates' as diplomatic concessions.

brand.name: RealFake News
brand.motto: The Truth is Whatever You Believe Most Loudly
